comments:
If I insert the following line into my ANT-XML file I'm no longer able to save the XML-File with the ANT-Editor.
<import file="test.xml" />

This line works:
<import file="test" />

The following errror occurs:
Save failed: org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration
